job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt mee aan de roadmaps voor MijnFlorius/MijnMoneyou, maar ook onderdelen van de extranetten of toepassingen zoals de chatbot, de Florius apps, digitaal ondertekenen, online identificeren, implementatie van Wallets, aansluiten van data-bronnen etc.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes contributing to the development and implementation of various digital applications and features, which falls under traditional software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Complexe vraagstukken (functionaliteit voor klanten en adviseurs zoals inloggen, extra aflossen via iDeal, indienen en wijzigingen van hypotheekverzoeken) vind je uitdagend om samen met je team op te lossen.
job_tasks.justification: This describes solving complex functional issues for users, which is a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Maar ook storingen komen direct bij het team terecht, dus moeten in worden gepast.
job_tasks.justification: Handling and fixing system failures (storingen) is a responsibility within software development and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Dit doe je in een moderne IT omgeving
job_tasks.justification: Working within a modern IT environment is a general context for software development.

job_tasks.phrase: je werkt zeer intensief samen met de IT-collega's die de (veelal Digital) zaken realiseren.
job_tasks.justification: Intensive collaboration with IT colleagues who realize digital matters is a characteristic of software development teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt dagelijks in het agile team en samen ben je van idee tot en met realisatie en gebruik verantwoordelijk.
job_tasks.justification: Working in an agile team and being responsible from idea to realization and usage is a core software development lifecycle responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Met je team breng je dit van "een idee" naar werkende functionaliteit waar klanten en adviseurs dagelijks gebruik van kunnen maken.
job_tasks.justification: Translating ideas into working functionality for end-users is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Een deel van de werkzaamheden bevat het vertalen van wet- en regelgeving naar concrete stories die developers kunnen oppakken.
job_tasks.justification: Translating regulations into actionable stories for developers is a task within the software development process, often done by product owners or business analysts working closely with development teams.

job_tasks.phrase: Binnen Florius/Moneyou werk je samen met je team aan digitale oplossingen voor (onafhankelijk) hypotheekadviseurs en klanten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes working on digital solutions for specific user groups (advisors and customers) within the mortgage business, indicating an understanding of the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt dus midden in de hypotheken business
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states being in the middle of the mortgage business, highlighting business context awareness.

job_tasks.phrase: Om je werk goed te doen, moet je je zelf regelmatig verdiepen in de materie, zodat de beste oplossing voor adviseur of klant kan worden gemaakt.
job_tasks.justification: The need to understand the subject matter to create the best solution for the client/advisor demonstrates business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: door middel van Usability onderzoek, zodat je zeker weet dat het een succes gaat worden.
job_tasks.justification: Conducting usability research to ensure success relates to understanding user needs and business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met diverse teams om AI en ML oplossingen af te stemmen op bedrijfsdoelen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase, though not in the ad, is an example of the category. The ad itself implies this by mentioning working with different departments and aligning digital solutions with business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: werk je samen met je team aan digitale oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: Working together with a team is a clear indicator of collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen werken jullie aan innovatieve toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: Working together on innovative applications highlights collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Complexe vraagstukken ... vind je uitdagend om samen met je team op te lossen.
job_tasks.justification: Solving complex issues together with the team emphasizes collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: je werkt zeer intensief samen met de IT-collega's
job_tasks.justification: Intensive collaboration with IT colleagues is a direct mention of this soft skill.

job_tasks.phrase: je werkt dagelijks in het agile team en samen ben je van idee tot en met realisatie en gebruik verantwoordelijk.
job_tasks.justification: Working daily in an agile team and being jointly responsible implies strong collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Om je werk goed te doen, moet je je zelf regelmatig verdiepen in de materie
job_tasks.justification: The need to regularly immerse oneself in the subject matter indicates a commitment to learning and understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen werken jullie aan innovatieve toepassingen
job_tasks.justification: Working on innovative applications suggests a drive for innovation.

job_tasks.phrase: Het team is verantwoordelijk voor de verdere invulling en realisatie van het product.
job_tasks.justification: The team being responsible for the further development and realization of the product indicates ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: Het team houdt die verantwoordelijkheid ook na oplevering ("You build it, you run it").
job_tasks.justification: The 'You build it, you run it' principle clearly signifies ownership and responsibility for the product's lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Het team bepaalt zelf de eigen backlog in afstemming met de Lead Product Owner.
job_tasks.justification: The team determining its own backlog demonstrates initiative and ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: Met je team breng je dit van "een idee" naar werkende functionaliteit
job_tasks.justification: Taking an idea and bringing it to working functionality shows initiative and ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: binnen Florius/Moneyou met alle mogelijkheden om je ideeën te realiseren met je team.
job_tasks.justification: The opportunity to realize ideas within the team points towards innovation and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software development tasks, such as building and maintaining digital solutions, handling system failures, and translating business requirements into actionable tasks for developers. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related technologies. The role is clearly within the scope of Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering) and does not involve any tasks from Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization). Therefore, the most appropriate profile is 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on digital solutions and traditional software development practices. There are no mentions of AI or ML, making the classification straightforward and unambiguous.
